marawarayin kandayamak samaga moratuwa modara niwasakata gos ehi wasana kanthawakata tharjanaya kara ema kanthawage bappa hata polu walin gasa ema sthanaye yaka natu moratuwa maha nagara sabhawe manthri warayeku ha thawath dedeneku moratuwa modara polisiya magin athadanguwata gena atha.sakakaru mahesthrath adhikaranaya wetha idiripath kirimen anathuruwa 28 wana dina dakwa rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kirimata moratuwa disa winisuru bi. ee. aar. somasinha mahatha wisin niyoga karana ladi.moratuwa modara pradeshaye padinchi mema nagarika manthriwaraya ihatha ki niwase kanthawa samaga aniyam sabandakamak pawathwagena gos atha.
eeta passe narthana prasanga kihipayakata aaradhana labuna eewata sahabhagi wuna.

rupiyal biliyana 1200 ka wathkam sahitha lanka bankuwa merata banku wathkam walin 24% ka himikarithwaya darayi.emenma lanka bankuwe thanpathu wala padanama rupiyal biliyana 842ki.1939 di sthapitha kerunu lanka bankuwa me wanawita shri lankawe pramukhathama mulya sewa sapayanna bawata pathwa sitiyi.

sama janadhipathiwarayekuma balayata pathwu wigasa ‘honda’ wi pasuwa narak wu aakaraya gana rate janathawata awabodhayak pawathi.
me awasthawe wipakshaya kala yuthu wanne, kipa denek idiripath kirima nowa, aanduwa podu sathura lesa salaka, siyalu denatama piligatha haki, podu apekshakayaku idiripath kirimayi.
apaganna sama aahara welakata pasuwa dath mada pirisidu kalayuthu wuwath eya apa ude saha rathri nindata yamata pera sidu karanawa.
